title: MC_CAMSWITCH_TR (Struct)
text:
TYPE MC_CAMSWITCH_TR : STRUCT
This
STRUCT
describes the switch positions of the tappets.

rows.Name: TrackNumber
rows.Comment:
Number of the output; several position ranges per output are
possible. [1..32]

rows.Name: FirstOnPosition
rows.Comment:
If moving in positive direction, the first position where the switch is on, otherwise the last;
may be>LastOnPositionwhich results in an âinvertedâ switch

rows.Name: LastOnPosition
rows.Comment:
If moving in positive direction, the last position where the switch is on, otherwise the first;
Used only in caseCamSwitchMode=0

rows.Name: AxisDirection
rows.Comment: 0 = The output is switched in two directions,1 = The output is only switched in positive direction,2 = The output is only switched in negative direction

rows.Name: CamSwitchMode
rows.Comment:
0 = The tappets are calculated position-based;1 = The tappets are calculated time-based, whereby only the value of FirstOnPosition will be used
and the output staysTRUEfor the given time (Duration).

rows.Name: Duration
rows.Comment:
Period of time for which the tappet output staysTRUEin
case ofCAMSwitchMode=1.
